title: A proclamation, by the King and Queens Majesties. ... Whereas there have been several treasonable, and seditious designs and combinations, set on foot of late, in both our kingdoms, by persons enemies to the Protestant religion, and ill affected to our government ...
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King and Queens most excellent Majesties,
